page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT MeltonRoss Elsham
page.content: Within this square (11 04),in South Humberside there are only 8 seperate households living in 7 houses.Evidence of 3 recently abandoned house sites was found.The details on the 1982 1:25000 ordnance survey TA01/11 were found to be inaccurate re. buildings. In every case at least one member, normally it's male head, is employed in Agriculture; except one gardener who works for a farmer. A further 16 people travel in to work here,10 in industry,6 in farming. 5 years ago a sales engineer started a buiness repairing farm machinery. This enterprise now operates from a 2000 sq.foot workshop at Moor Farm. There are 3 full time mechanics,plus the boss.25 to 30 tractors are sold each year,plus other equipment, pea harvesters being a speciality.Most of the customers are within 25 miles.
